name: My Hotel: Echoes of the Past
name_original: My Hotel: Echoes of the Past
description:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2847390/Escape_Island/



My Hotel: Echoes of the Past! Welcome to the intrigue of the 1950s, where mystery cloaks every corner of My Hotel. Remember - this is a free trial. Ensure you're in the loop by adding the game to your Steam Wishlist for the full, thrilling story.



You've just landed the role of a lifetime: owner of a hotel that's seen better days. It's like stepping into a 1950s adventure movie – the previous owner's mysterious end, a hotel riddled with secrets, and now, it's all yours.



Your quest: to transform this relic into a beacon of style and history. Choose from a range of furnishings that span decades, each with its own story to tell.


But it's not just about the décor. The guests are as varied as they are mysterious, some with quests that will draw you into a tangle of alliances and covert affairs.


Balance these factions carefully to keep your hotel thriving and avoid a fate like your predecessor's. It's a game where adventure meets history, and every decision you make is a part of the legend.
